name: Ogrepede
description: The Ogrepede is a massive undead creature with terrifying and chaotic features, characterized by its large size and fear-inducing presence.
memorable: The Ogrepede can inflict fear on nearby opponents and has a potent charge attack that can critically strike its targets.
goals: To instill fear and chaos in combat, overwhelming opponents with its brute strength.
relations: It may be related to or serve other undead creatures or dark entities.
environment: Typically found in dark and desolate locations, often where undead creatures dwell.
strengths: High hit points, powerful melee attacks, ability to frighten multiple adversaries at once.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma may limit its tactical abilities and interactions.
attacks: The Ogrepede attacks using a bite that deals piercing damage and a slam attack that delivers bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Overwhelming Assault, causing multiple nearby creatures to potentially become frightened on a critical hit.
senses: It has darkvision up to 90 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and conditions such as being charmed or exhausted.
Can make a critical hit that significantly increases its damage output.
Vulnerable to attacks when using its Haphazard Charge ability.
Can only understand languages it knew in life.
test_queries: massive undead creature that inflicts fear
huge monster with chaotic evil alignment
undead creature with powerful slam attacks
terrifying undead that charges at enemies
